Internships

  • Research intern, MindQuantum, Huawei, China, 10.2023-12.2023. Topics: Materials and atoms simulation with quantum circuits using MindQuantum (Similar like Qiskit). Here is demo script applying quantum circuits to simulate the ground-state energy of a Hamiltonian of Hydrogen molecules.

  • Research intern, North Carolina State University, USA, 03.2019-10.2019. Topics: Anatomy of Nucleon Self-energy from Instant to Light-Front, advisor: Dr. Chueng Ji. (Undergraduate thesis project.)
